test-set.name: mode
test-set.description: Tests the use of modes in xsl:template and xsl:apply-templates

test-case.name: mode-0001
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with comment nodes
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference comment-nodes parentless-nodes

test-case.name: mode-0002
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with comment nodes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference comment-nodes streamable parentless-nodes

test-case.name: mode-0003
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with processing instruction nodes
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference processing-instruction-nodes parentless-nodes

test-case.name: mode-0004
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with processing instruction nodes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference processing-instruction-nodes parentless-nodes streamable

test-case.name: mode-0005
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with text nodes
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference text-nodes parentless-nodes

test-case.name: mode-0006
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with text nodes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference text-nodes parentless-nodes streamable

test-case.name: mode-0007
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with attribute nodes
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference attribute-nodes parentless-nodes

test-case.name: mode-0008
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with attribute nodes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference attribute-nodes parentless-nodes streamable

test-case.name: mode-0009
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with namespace nodes
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference namespace-nodes parentless-nodes non-streamable

test-case.name: mode-0010
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match with namespace nodes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-skip shallow-copy text-only-copy variable-reference namespace-nodes parentless-nodes streamable

test-case.name: mode-0011
test-case.description: Use boolean function call in predicate. Saxon bug 1992
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-copy attribute-nodes stylesheet-function predicate

test-case.name: mode-0101
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with mode.

test-case.name: mode-0102
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with mode not found.

test-case.name: mode-0103
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with no mode.

test-case.name: mode-0104
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with mode, using the default rule.

test-case.name: mode-0105
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with mode, using a qualified name.

test-case.name: mode-0106
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with mode, using a non-qualified name, but with a qualified name in scope.

test-case.name: mode-0107
test-case.description: Test apply-templates to the root of a temporary tree

test-case.name: mode-0108
test-case.description: Test apply-templates when context node is a temporary tree

test-case.name: mode-0201
test-case.description: Simple test of xsl:apply-templates with moded template calling xsl:apply-templates on another template.

test-case.name: mode-0301
test-case.description: FileName: MODES10 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7 Modes

test-case.name: mode-0401
test-case.description: FileName: modes11 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7

test-case.name: mode-0501
test-case.description: FileName: modes12 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7

test-case.name: mode-0601
test-case.description: FileName: modes13 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7

test-case.name: mode-0701
test-case.description: FileName: modes14 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7

test-case.name: mode-0801a
test-case.description: Ambiguous match

test-case.name: mode-0801b
test-case.description: Ambiguous match

test-case.name: mode-0801c
test-case.description: Ambiguous match

test-case.name: mode-0901
test-case.description: FileName: MODES16 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7 Modes

test-case.name: mode-1001
test-case.description: FileName: MODES17 Document: http://www.w3.org/TR/xslt DocVersion: 19991116 Section: 5.7 Modes

test-case.name: mode-1101
test-case.description: Match a template whose mode list is just X, where a named mode X is set at the time the transformation is launched.

test-case.name: mode-1102
test-case.description: Match a template whose mode list is X and other names, but not #default. Where a named mode X is set at the time the transformation is launched.

test-case.name: mode-1103
test-case.description: Match a template whose mode list is #all. Where a named mode X is set at the time the transformation is launched.

test-case.name: mode-1104
test-case.description: Set stylesheet params, at least one of which will be used in the match="/" mode="X" template. Where a named mode X is set at the time the transformation is launched.

result.assert-xml: <out> mode-X (/): assignedValue mode-#all (doc): inside named-templates: mode-X: brown-fox</out>

test-case.name: mode-1105
test-case.description: Set an initial context node, and have a template to match that node in mode X. Where a named mode X is set at the time the transformation is launched.

test-case.name: mode-1201
test-case.description: Basic test for mode="#all" (XSLT 2.0)

test-case.name: mode-1202
test-case.description: Test for mode="#all" appearing before the specific templates (XSLT 2.0)

test-case.name: mode-1203
test-case.description: Test for mode="#all" appearing before the specific templates and with higher priority (XSLT 2.0)

test-case.name: mode-1204
test-case.description: Test for mode="#all" with next-match (XSLT 2.0)

result.assert-xml: <out><m1><a mode="m1"/><b mode="#all"/><b mode="m1"/></m1><m2><a mode="m2"/><b mode="#all"/><b mode="m2"/></m2></out>

test-case.name: mode-1301
test-case.description: Test for mode="#all" with built-in template rules (XSLT 2.0)

test-case.name: mode-1401
test-case.description: Test for mode="#current" in a function reverts to the unnamed mode (XSLT 2.0, clarfied by erratum XT.E19)

test-case.name: mode-1402
test-case.description: Test for mode="#current" in an attribute set retains the current mode (XSLT 2.0, clarfied by erratum XT.E19)

test-case.name: mode-1403
test-case.description: Test for mode="#current" in a global variable uses the unnamed mode (XSLT 2.0, clarfied by erratum XT.E19)

test-case.name: mode-1404
test-case.description: Test for mode="#current" in a global variable uses the unnamed mode (XSLT 2.0, clarfied by erratum XT.E19)

test-case.name: mode-1405
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy"

result.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1406
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy", streaming

result.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1407
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy"

result.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1408
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy"; streaming

result.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1409
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy"

result.assert: starts-with(., " THE FIRST BOOK OF MOSES, CALLED GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1410
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="text-only-copy"; streaming

result.assert: starts-with(., " THE FIRST BOOK OF MOSES, CALLED GENESIS.")

test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="copy"

test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="copy"

test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="copy"; streaming

test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="discard"

test-case.name: mode-1420
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="discard"; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute streamable shallow-skip matching-mode xsl:next-match

test-case.name: mode-1421
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="discard"
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-copy shallow-skip matching-mode xsl:next-match non-matching-mode

test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match="discard"; streaming

test-case.name: mode-1423
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, no failure occurs

test-case.name: mode-1424
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, no failure occurs; streaming

test-case.name: mode-1425
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, failure occurs but is caught
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute fail xsl:try xsl:catch XTDE0555

test-case.name: mode-1426
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, failure occurs but is caught; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute streamable fail xsl:try xsl:catch XTDE0555

test-case.name: mode-1427
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode warning-on-no-match=yes

all-of.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1428
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode warning-on-no-match=yes; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute streamable text-only-copy matching-mode warning-on-no-match

all-of.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1429
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode warning-on-no-match=no

all-of.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1430
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode warning-on-no-match=no; streaming
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute text-only-copy matching-mode warning-on-no-match xsl:apply-imports

all-of.assert: starts-with(., " The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS.")

test-case.name: mode-1431
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, failure occurs

test-case.name: mode-1432
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=fail, failure occurs; streaming

test-case.name: mode-1433
test-case.description: Test default-mode attribute

result.assert-xml: <root> The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS. <book><QED>Genesis</QED></book> Chapter 1 Chapter 2 </root>

test-case.description: Test default-mode attribute

result.assert-xml: <root> The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS. <book><QED>Genesis</QED></book> Chapter 1 Chapter 2 </root>

test-case.description: Test default-mode attribute

result.assert-xml: <root> The First Book of Moses, Called GENESIS. <book><QED>Genesis</QED></book> Chapter 1 Chapter 2 </root>

test-case.name: mode-1436
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=deep-skip

test-case.name: mode-1437
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode on-no-match=deep-skip; streaming

test-case.name: mode-1438
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode with typed="yes", fails because nodes are untyped

test-case.name: mode-1439
test-case.description: Test xsl:mode with typed="yes", fails because nodes are untyped
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-copy matching-mode typed-yes XTTE3100

test-case.name: mode-1501
test-case.description: Test for mode="#all" with match="node()"

test-case.name: mode-1502
test-case.description: Conflicting attributes on xsl:mode declarations
test-case.keywords: xsl:mode on-no-match-attribute shallow-copy text-only-copy on-multiple-match-attribute fail XTSE0545

test-case.name: mode-1503
test-case.description: Conflicting attributes on xsl:mode declarations, resolved by import precedence

test-case.name: mode-1504
test-case.description: Conflicting attributes on xsl:mode declarations, resolved by import precedence although declarations are not in import order

test-case.name: mode-1505
test-case.description: Conflicting attributes on xsl:mode declarations at the same import precedence, resolved by another declaration at higher import precedence

test-case.name: mode-1506
test-case.description: Conflicting attributes on xsl:mode declarations at the same import precedence, unresolved by another declaration at higher import precedence
